constraints.constraint: Projections must be idempotent - replaying events produces same database state
SQLite stores JSON as TEXT - use serde_json::to_string() for Vec<T> serialization
SQLx query macros disabled - runtime query verification only (no compile-time checks)
Evento subscriptions process events asynchronously - use unsafe_oneshot for synchronous test processing
Week status calculation logic: Future (start_date > today), Current (start_date <= today <= end_date), Past (end_date < today)
All projections follow CQRS pattern: events → handlers → read model tables
Integration tests use in-memory SQLite (:memory:) for fast execution
Test coverage target: >90% per Story 6.7 requirements
Projections update read models for fast queries (not normalized schema)
generation_batch_id links all weeks generated in same multi-week batch

interface.name: SubscribeBuilder::unsafe_oneshot
interface.signature: pub async fn unsafe_oneshot(self, executor: &Executor) -> Result<(), Error>
interface.usage: Process subscription synchronously in tests instead of run(&executor)

interface.name: serde_json::to_string
interface.signature: pub fn to_string<T: Serialize>(value: &T) -> Result<String, serde_json::Error>
interface.usage: Serialize Vec<T> to JSON string for TEXT column storage

interface.name: serde_json::from_str
interface.signature: pub fn from_str<T: DeserializeOwned>(s: &str) -> Result<T, serde_json::Error>
interface.usage: Deserialize JSON string from TEXT column to Vec<T>

interface.name: sqlx::query
interface.usage: Execute INSERT/UPDATE queries for projection handlers

interface.name: sqlx::query_as
interface.usage: Query and deserialize rows to read model structs

tests.standards: Testing follows TDD approach with integration tests for all projection handlers. Tests use in-memory SQLite (:memory:) for fast execution. Evento subscriptions tested with unsafe_oneshot for synchronous event processing (not async run). All tests verify database state after emitting events. JSON round-trip serialization tested explicitly for Vec<T> fields. Test coverage target: >90% per Story 6.7. Tests cleanup after execution (drop tables). Use sqlx::migrate for schema setup in tests.
